Sample.Code: <World Directory="None" Tracer="Whitted"> <ViewPlane Height="200" Width="800" Samples="100" PixelSize="1" MaxDepth="5" Sampler="Regular"/> <EnviromentalLight> <AmbientOcculder Color="1,1,1" Radiance="1" Sampler="MultiJittered" Shadows="True"/> </EnviromentalLight> <Camera> <Pinhole Position="40,10,0" Target="0.1,0.5,0" Zoom="1.0" Distance="5000" ExposureTime="1" RollAngle="0"/> </Camera> <Lights> <PointLight Color="1,1,1" Position="4,4,0" Shadows="True" Radiance="3"/> </Lights> <Objects> <Sphere Position="0,0.5,0" Radius="0.5" Name="sphere1" Shadows="True"> <Reflective SpecularColor="1,0.1,0.1" SpecularCoff="0.2" ReflectiveColor="1,0.1,0.1" ReflectiveCoff="0.8" Exponent="20" AmbientRelfectionCoff="0.8" DiffuseRelfectionCoff="0.2" Color="1,0.1,0.1" Shadows="True"/> </Sphere> <Disk Center="0,0.5,-1.2" Direction="1,1,0" Name="Disk1" Radius="0.5" Shadows="True"> <Matte Color="0.1,1,0.1" ReflectionCoff="0.5" DiffuseCoff="0.5" Shadows="True"/> </Disk> <Box Min="-0.5,0,1" Max="0.5,1,2" Name="Box1" Shadows="False"> <Transparent SpecularColor="0.1,0.1,1" SpecularCoff="0.2" ReflectiveColor="0.1,0.1,1" ReflectiveCoff="0.1" Exponent="20" AmbientRelfectionCoff="0.3" DiffuseRelfectionCoff="0.3" Color="0.1,0.1,1" IOR="1.3" TransCoff="1.0" Shadows="True"/> </Box> <Plane Position="0,0,0" Direction="0,1,0" Name="MainPlane" Shadows="True"> <Matte ReflectionCoff="0.5" DiffuseCoff="0.5" Color="1,1,1" Shadows="True"/> </Plane> </Objects> </World>
